<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="comment">/// lowerIncomingArguments - To avoid having to handle incoming arguments</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Swift error really is a register that we model as memory -- instruction</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// selection will perform mem-to-reg for us and spill/reload appropriately</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// around calls that clobber it. There is no need to spill this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value to the stack and doing so would not be allowed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
